alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 9:00AM CST until February 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts of 35 to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Alabama, Marshall, Jackson, DeKalb and Cullman Counties. In Tennessee, Franklin TN County. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
